content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems (Ireland) Limited, whose registered office is at One Spencer Dock, North Wall Quay, Dublin 1, Ireland (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\", \\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"we\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\", \\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"us\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\" or \\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"our\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\") recognizes its employees' right to privacy. This privacy notice (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Notice\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\") is intended to ensure that you are aware of how we, as a controller, use, process and disclose your personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (“\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GDPR\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”), Data Protection Act 2018, EU Privacy and Electronic Communications Directive 2002/58/EC, and any national implementing laws, as amended or updated from time to time.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you are processed and the means we use to carry out such processing activities. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pursuant to the GDPR, we are required to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this privacy notice so that you are aware of how and why we process your personal data. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
